We can help you reset your password using your email address linked to your account.
Thanks! Please check your email for a link to reset your password.

At Scribbler, weâ€™ve taken up the challenge of providing a clutter-free product that serves as an effective advertising medium. Our notebooks contain a limited set of advertising space helping advertisers communicate directly with all students of our affiliated colleges. Advertisers can run digital promotions by embedding a unique Scribbler code within their print advertisement. These codes when scanned through the Scribbler mobile app give deals and offers to the students, thereby creating a platform which connects print to digital media.

resources.string: Enter the OTP sent to your registered mobile number for verification
Note: Mobile Verification is required to give you better experience of using this app.
